tool_description: This tool predicts the structure of protein-ligand complexes from sequence information.

required_parameters.name: protein_sequence
required_parameters.description: A string representing the amino acid sequence of the protein.

required_parameters.name: ligand_sequence
required_parameters.description: A SMILES(simplified molecular input line entry system) string representing the sequence of the ligand.

optional_parameters.name: protein_pocket
optional_parameters.description: The location of protein pockets(string split by comma, like 10, 11, 12, 15).

optional_parameters.name: num_recycles
optional_parameters.description: Number of recycles to use in the prediction.

return_values.name: complex_structure
return_values.description: The predicted 3D structure of the protein-ligand complex saved as a PDB file.
